text: Michele Russo (30 January 1945 - 30 March 2019) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. == Biography == Russo was born in Italy and was ordained to the priesthood in 1970. He served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Doba, Chad, from 1989 to 2014.Diocese of Doba ==Notes== Category:1945 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Chadian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops in Africa
title: Michele Russo (bishop)
